bodydiv.p: When the Board has reached general agreement on the technical matters in the project and has considered the likely effects of the new IFRS Standard (see paragraphs 3.76â€“3.81), the technical staff presents a paper to the Board:

li.p: summarising the steps that the Board has taken in developing the Standard, including a summary of when the Board discussed this project in public meetings, public hearings held, outreach activities and meetings of consultative groups;
if applicable, reaffirming why the Board has decided that it was not necessary to have a consultative group or to have conducted fieldwork; and
assessing whether the proposals can be finalised or whether they should be re-exposed.
